original_text: And they shall eat up thine harvest, and thy bread, which thy sons and thy daughters should eat: they shall eat up thy flocks and thine herds: they shall eat up thy vines and thy fig trees: they shall impoverish thy fenced cities, wherein thou trustedst, with the sword.
korean_text: 그들이 네 자녀들이 먹을 추수 곡물과 양식을 먹으며 네 양 떼와 소 떼를 먹으며 네 포도나무와 무화과나무 열매를 먹으며 네가 믿는 견고한 성들을 칼로 파멸하리라

sentences.original_text: And they shall eat up thine harvest
which thy sons and thy daughters should eat
sentences.korean_translation: 네 아들들과 딸들이 먹어야 할 것을

sentences.original_text: they shall eat up thy flocks
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너의 양 떼를 먹어버릴 것이며

sentences.original_text: they shall eat up thy vines
they shall impoverish thy fenced cities
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 너의 요새 도시들을 가난하게 만들 것이며
